description:
# Create a Consignee
A Consignee is the person or company designated to receive the cargo at the destination port.

In ERPNext, the Consignee record captures details such as name, address, contact information, and reference documents. It is linked to each sea freight booking and appears in essential documents like the Bill of Lading and Delivery Order.
name: Create a Consignee
title: Create a Consignee
